fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to provide a professional and easy-to-read experience suitable for a resume/CV.
fontTheory.readability: The combination of Georgia for body text provides excellent readability, especially for longer sections, while Arial for headings and titles ensures clear hierarchy.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The typographic hierarchy is established through the use of different font families and sizes for headings, body text, and titles.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia complement each other well, with Arial offering a modern and clean look for headings and Georgia providing a classic and elegant style for body text.
